title: create payment for registration
description: Test the /create-payment endpoint to ensure it correctly creates a payment for a championship registration using different payment methods (PIX, credit card, debit card), applies valid coupons, calculates platform fees, and handles payment splitting between organizer and platform.

title: handle asaas webhook events
description: Test the /asaas-webhook endpoint to verify it correctly processes webhook events from Asaas such as PAYMENT_RECEIVED, PAYMENT_CONFIRMED, PAYMENT_OVERDUE, PAYMENT_DELETED, and PAYMENT_REFUNDED, updates payment and registration statuses accordingly, and triggers confirmation emails on payment approval.

title: check payment status from asaas
description: Test the /check-payment-status endpoint to ensure it correctly queries the Asaas API for the current status of a payment by paymentId, updates the local database with the latest status, and returns accurate payment information.

title: send registration confirmation email
description: Test the /send-registration-email endpoint to verify it sends confirmation emails to athletes after successful registration, including championship details, registration info, and payment status, and handles email service errors gracefully.

title: validate asaas credentials
description: Test the /validate-asaas-account endpoint to ensure it validates Asaas API key and wallet ID for organizer integrations, returns correct validation results, and provides account information or error messages as appropriate.

title: refresh pix qr code
description: Test the /refresh-pix-qrcode endpoint to verify it refreshes the PIX QR code for a payment by fetching updated data from Asaas, returns the new QR code, copy-paste code, and expiration date correctly.

title: update global platform fee configuration
description: Test the /rpc/update_global_platform_fee RPC endpoint to ensure it updates the global platform fee configuration correctly with given fee type and value, and triggers recalculation of fees for all pending registrations.

title: increment coupon usage count
description: Test the /rpc/increment_coupon_usage RPC endpoint to verify it atomically increments the usage count of a coupon by coupon_id and handles concurrent increments correctly.
